item.description:
Total Marketing Makeover

Monday, September 24, 2007 (4pm?10pm)
Take charge of your business. Marketing and staying current is the key to this ever changing photographic marketplace.

CIPNE brings together the marketing gurus at Workbook, White Rhino Design and Kate & Company for an evening of Marketing MasterMinds. You?ll discover what?s hot in the industry, how to get your portfolio noticed, hear a critique of design flaws, and see new products at our specialized trade show.

CIPNE?s Total Marketing Makeover will put your business at the front of the pack. Make the choice to lead, not follow!

Featured Speakers:

* Workbook.com - Allegra Wilde
    The Importance of Original Thinking.

* White Rhino Design - Dan Greenwald
    Common Mistakes in Self Promotion Materials.

* Kate & Company - Kate Hennessy
    Your Best Rep......YOU!


Featured Vendors:

* Live Books - online portfolio websites.

* 48HourPrint.com - high quality 4 color print products.

* Lost Luggage - presentation portfolios & consulting.

* Photopia - coffee table books.

* Ennis Inc. - styling for maximum impact.


Raffle
Throughout the evening, CIPNE will be raffling off door prizes including three 1-year online portfolios donated by PhotoServe. You must be present to win, so come early! ** Bring a friend and get an extra raffle ticket.**

NEW LOCATION!
Hilton Garden Inn
420 Totten Pond Rd.
Waltham, MA 02451
 
Registration: 3:45pm?5pm
Tradeshow: 4pm?10pm
Speakers: 5pm?9:30pm

Pre-registration is required for this program.
Cost:
CIPNE Members - Free, Non-members - $35, Students/Assistants - $15
Click here to register (Non-members may pay by Paypal)
Please note: on-line registration closes September 21st.
 
CIPNE | P.O. BOX 600291 | Newtonville | MA | 02460

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: CIPNE EVENT: Total Marketing Makeover
